### Install Docker-desktop and git

https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/
https://git-scm.com/book/fr/v2/D%C3%A9marrage-rapide-Installation-de-Git

### Linux 

https://docs.docker.com/desktop/linux/install/

* clone RFLOMICS 

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
git clone --branch develop.0.1 https://forgemia.inra.fr/flomics/rflomics.git
```

* Build Docker Image

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
cd RFLOMICS
docker build --file=Dockerfile --tag=rflomics .
```

* Run Docker

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
docker run -it -p 3838:3838 -v ${HOME}:/root --name='rflomics' --cpus 8 rflomics
```

* Start/Stop 

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
docker stop rflomics
```

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
docker start rflomics
```

* remove


```{bash, eval=FALSE}
docker rm rflomics
```
